Actions as seller will be available when: Actions will be available when there is a message interaction. As the seller, be responsive to the buyer during the 10-day period when their payment is held in the smart contract. If you don't respond, the buyer can close the deal and retrieve their payment. After 10 days, you can close the deal and keep the payment if the buyer hasn't communicated their intentions, but it's best to work towards a mutually beneficial outcome.
Actions as buyer will be available when: Actions will be available when there is a message interaction. Please note that your payment will be held in the smart contract for 10 days. If you do not receive a response from the seller within this time, you will be able to close the deal and retrieve your payment. However, please be aware that after the 10-day period, the seller also has the option to close the deal and retain the payment if you have not communicated your intentions
Please confirm: Please confirm that you have received the work and have verified that it satisfies all of the conditions you specified during the chat before releasing the payment. Do not confirm and inform the vendor on the chat if the work they completed did not meet your expectations.
Confirm: Always confirm that you have received the seller is service before tapping [Release payment]. DO NOT release crypto to the buyer if you havenâ€™t received their service.
Issues: If you encounter any issues during the transaction process, you can start a claim and a third party intermediary will assist you on solving your case.

If you agree with the claim made by the: If you agree with the claim made by the buyer, you can choose to make a refund according to the amount required.
Dispute claim: If you think there is nothing wrong with the service provided, you can dispute the buyer's claim. Participating in the arbitration will have an extra cost of 30dai, and the status of that decision will be taken and communicated in the next few days by a decentralized jury external to Yubiai.
